title: Device Information security & user id
body:
I noticed some programs are using the hardware device id for giving comfort to the user - even after reset. This is a privacy fault since I cannot delete all internet stored data connected to this id. So I won't sell my phone.
For this I would like an user id (anonymous) so my data "move" to my other phones and delete from phones without logged in live account. There should be a random id instead after every reset.
